author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Such an obscure character
review:
Opening;

Apache chief is a figure who belongs in a western set .

The Minifigure-

 The figure has a nice hair band combo piece , nice face print , great torso and arm printing , leg and side Leg printing .

The accesory-

The Accessorys include a photo reel with gleek the wonder twins monkey photo bombing him the stand is the Batman movie series two printed Batman emblem .

In conclusion-

this is a nice figure I just feel as if there should be something more perhaps gleek as he came with neither of zan or jayna overall a nice figure and I would recommend it.

author: Odeinoichus
title: Super Friends Arrive!
review:
Set #71020 Apache Chief: The 1970s were a simpler time, and racial diversity was often criticised for being racist. That being said, if you grew up with the Super Friends, then Apache Chief is definitely a Minifigure for you. With some great looking detailing on the torso and legs, Apache Chief is an impressively detailed character, the re-use of the hippie hairstyle with bandanna is definitely a good choice. His accessory is a 1x3 printed tile with some sort of comical style misadventure. Showing Apache Chief having a great time and then suddenly being attacked by a monkey. I have no idea if this is a reference to something or what, but it could be a reference to Gleek.

It is odd seeing the Luthor face expression printed on a different coloured head though. I would recommend this for fans of the Super Friends, this entire Series has been a huge love letter to DC in general with some great character choices. Recommended.
